text: developing news story in Zimbabwe at the

soldiers have cheered the crowds and
that's confirmed the Army's role in

end as numbers on the streets have
swelled throughout the morning state
media have said that 8 out of 10
regional branches of the governing
zanu-pf party have passed a vote of no
confidence in the president Mr Mugabe
has been under house arrest since a
military takeover four days ago

it feels well as everyone's telling me

they simply weren't prepared to have

in this country they simply couldn't
